english: Many of our cultural treasures have been plundered by imperialists .
chinese: 我国许多珍贵文物被帝国主义掠走了。

english: Imperialism is monopolistic , parasitic and moribund capitalism .
chinese: 帝国主义是垄断的、寄生的、垂死的资本主义。

english: As long as imperialism exists there will be soil for wars of aggression .
chinese: 只要帝国主义还存在，就有发生侵略战争的土壤。

english: The may 4th movement was at once anti-imperialist and anti-feudal .
chinese: 五四运动是反对帝国主义的运动，又是反对封建主义的运动。

english: Gone forever are the days when the imperialists enslaved the chinese people .
chinese: 帝国主义奴役中国人民的时代已经一去不复返了。
帝国主义造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Our two peoples share the same experience of having been oppressed by imperialism .
chinese: 我们两国人民都有遭受帝国主义压迫的共同经历。

english: Such international interest had to be free from any suspicion of economic imperialism .
chinese: 这种国际上的关心必须毫无帝国主义经济的嫌疑。

english: The old imperialismexploitation for foreign profithas no place in our plans .
chinese: 古老的帝国主义剥夺外国的利益将不包括在我们的计划之内。

english: The first systematic critique of modern imperialism was provided by the english radical j.a.hobson .
chinese: 第一次给予现代帝国主义以系统批判的是英国的激进分子JA霍布森。

english: He was represented as the leader of progressive humanity in a titanic struggle with the evil forces of western imperialism .
chinese: 他被誉为与西方帝国主义邪恶势力进行殊死斗争的进步人类领袖。

english: After all, if the established imperial nations did not exploit their positions, others were willing to do it instead .
chinese: 如果已经确立起来的帝国主义国家没有开发它们占有的阵地，毕竟还有别的国家想取而代之。

english: The most advanced stages of capitalism, which feature imperialism as their dominant mode of operation, contain internal contradictions which harbor the seeds of their own destruction .
chinese: 以帝国主义作为主要活动方式的资本主义的最先进阶段，孕育着自行毁灭的内部矛盾。
